description:
On Friday afternoon, Robert Kirkman revealed the title of the anticipated Walking Dead spin-off would be... Fear the Walking Dead.周五下午，Robert Kirkman宣布《行尸走肉人》的衍生剧剧名是....《害怕行尸走肉》。

Twitter全文：
IT'S OFFICIAL! The walking dead companion show on AMC is called FEAR THE WALKING DEAD! Expect more news very soon! #FearTheWalkingDead
— Robert Kirkman (@RobertKirkman) March 27, 2015正式宣布！AMC电视台《行尸走肉》衍生剧剧名叫做《害怕行尸走肉》！敬请期待更多消息！！#害怕行尸走肉#——Robert Kirkman 3月27日 2015年


Now, no offense to Kirkman or AMC, but that title totally blows.不是故意对Kirkman或者AMC找茬，不过这剧名也太烂了吧。

Here are 41 better alternate titles for Fear the Walking Dead.以下41个剧名，哪个都比你们那个好。

Fear and Groaning in Los Angeles

Cape Fear: Zombies

The Walking Dead: The Sum of all Fears

The Walking Dead: Genisys

Zombieland 2

The Walking Dead: Mockingjay - Part 3

The Walking Dead: The Desolation of Smaug

The Walking Dead: The Second One

The Walking Dead Too

The Walking Dead Forever

The Walking Dead Rises

The Walking Dead 2: Red, White and Dead

The Walking Dead: Revenge of the Walkers

The Walking Dead: Revenge of Kitty Galore

Night of the Living Walking Dead

Walk Hard: The Walking Dead Story

The Walking Dead: Live Free or Die Hard

The Walking Dead 2: Electric Boogaloo

The Walking Dead: Back 2 Tha Hood

The Walking Dead: The Squeakquel

TWD: LA

The Walking Dead: The Secret of the Ooze

The W2lking Dead

The Walking De2d

The Walking Dead: I Know How You Died Last Summer

Honey I Blew Up the Zombies

The Walking Dead: The Last Crusade

The Walking Dead: The Zombies Strike Back

The Walking Dead: The Zombie Menace

The Walking Dead 2DD

A Very Zombie Sequel

The Walking Dead: The New Batch

How to Train Your Zombie 2

The Walking Dead: Seventh Inning Fetch

The Walking Dead: Back in the Habit

The Walking Dead: Zombies Never Sleep

The Walking Dead: Armed and Fabulous

The Walking Dead: The Streets
